title: New game mode? 'Blind Fighting'
body:
no hud (except for item slot and gold). no minimap, no health/mana bars, no scoreboard, nothing that lets you know whats going on except your activates (because of hotkeys).

Thoughts/opinions?

replies.body: watched 'Hardcore Henry'. thats what gave me the idea
This is actually how they play in LCS :P
This actually sounds pretty fun. Dunno why you'd get downvoted. This will really teach people how to use their champs. :P
Feels like playing in Wood V again
